about abbreviations and symbols are
those examples of slang the answer is
yes and no abbreviations are short forms
of words I gave you one example FID for
video vid is a very inform
abbreviation in contrast et Cie that's a
very common abbreviation more standard
more mainstream ET c stands for etc it
means and so on and so forth
acronyms are also short forms but
they're formed by taking the first
letter of each word in a name or phrase
BFF stands for best friend forever it
can be written in upper or lowercase
letters many would list BFF as an
example of an acronym but technically it
is an abbreviation a short form it's
also a very informal one BFF is mostly
limited to internet slang and text chats
in contrast TLC which stands for tender
loving care is more standard more
mainstream but both BFF and TLC are just
abbreviations acronyms are formed the
same way as BFF and TLC but with
acronyms we get an actual word that we
can say a good example is JPEG a type of
file format for images JPEG stands for
joint photographic experts group someone
for example might send you a request
could you send me that as a JPEG file in
